children.subject:
Switching sections when waitlisted

I noticed that the first section of CS 189 has 96 people waitlisted, which is crazy. So I want to switch to another section. Is there any update on how to do this? Thanks!

history.content:
Dear Students; 
It has recently come to our attention that in our new system, students who are on a wait list and whose secondary sections become full are not able to switch their secondary sections without dropping from the wait list and losing their position. We have made the SIS team aware of this and they are trying to develop a fix. 
In the mean time, if you find yourself in this situation, we strongly urge you to NOT drop and re-add your class. This will move you to the bottom of the wait list. We are unable to manually move everyone back to their original wait list position once you have dropped and re-added. We understand that this is extremely problematic and have made SIS aware of our concerns. 
If you want to contact the folks at the SIS project regarding this issue: 
  1. E-mail:  sishelp@berkeley.edu
  2. Call: 510-664-9000 (then select 6 from the menu)
  3. Submit a ticket: https://berkeley.service-now.com/ess/create_incident

(Note: CalNet ID required to submit a ticket)  

We will keep you posted with any updates as soon as we know them. 
Many thanks,
Sarah
history.subject: Important Info re: Wait lists
